page.title: 13ALONG THE BONGATE
page.content: {1.BORDER PRINT & PACKAGING CO.} This company was started in 1975 by Mr. Galbraith.The main work is making cardboard boxes from big sheets,already painted in colour,from Germany,and there is corrugated as well as carton board. The machines are set to cut the cardboard so that the boxes can be folded perfectly.There is also a guillotine machine and a stapler machine.Most of the boxes are for Starrett's tool factory in Jedburgh.Six people are employed. {2.}Adjacent to B.P.P.C. is{ARTEN}who employ 20 people in making bow sights,stabilisation equipment for bows,devices for straightening arrows etc. {3}Next to{ARTEN,Geo Runciman employs several men specialising in furniture making and specialist carpentry work--spiral staircases etc.
